#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

PATTERN="${1:-}"

if [ -z "$PATTERN" ]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 <pattern> [options]"
    echo ""
    echo "Examples:"
    echo "  $0 nginx.conf          # Basic search"
    echo "  $0 '*.conf'            # Pattern search"
    echo "  $0 nginx --update      # Update DB first"
    echo "  $0 nginx --count       # Count results"
    exit 1
fi

# Check for options
UPDATE=false
COUNT=false
for arg in "$@"; do
    case "$arg" in
        --update) UPDATE=true ;;
        --count) COUNT=true ;;
    esac
done

# Update database if requested
if [ "$UPDATE" = true ]; then
    echo "Updating locate database..."
    sudo updatedb
    echo "Done!"
    echo ""
fi

# Search
if [ "$COUNT" = true ]; then
    echo "Results found: $(locate -ic "$PATTERN")"
else
    echo "Searching for: $PATTERN"
    echo ""
    locate -i "$PATTERN" | head -50
    
    TOTAL=$(locate -ic "$PATTERN")
    if [ "$TOTAL" -gt 50 ]; then
        echo ""
        echo "... and $(($TOTAL - 50)) more results."
        echo "Use --count to see total count."
    fi
fi
EOF
